coreAtributes.name: latex bodysuit
coreAtributes.description: A tight shiny latex bodysuit worn by high ranking members of the church of Lilith, it looks like liquid oil and conforms to every curve in an almost sinful way.

displacementText.playerSelf: You fully unbuckle your bodysuit and pull it off.
displacementText.playerNPC: You fully unbuckle [npc.name]'s bodysuit and pull it off.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you fully unbuckle [npc.her] bodysuit and roughly pull it off.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] fully unbuckles [npc.her] bodysuit and pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] fully unbuckles your bodysuit and pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] fully unbuckles your bodysuit and roughly pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] fully unbuckles [npc2.name]'s bodysuit and pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] fully unbuckles [npc2.her] bodysuit and roughly pulls it off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on your bodysuit and buckle yourself up.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name] into the bodysuit and buckle [npc.herHim] up.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.herHim] into the bodysuit, before buckling [npc.herHim] up.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls on [npc.her] bodysuit and buckles [npc.herself] up.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides you into the bodysuit and buckles you up.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces you into the bodysuit, before buckling you up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name] into the bodysuit and buckles [npc2.herHim] up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces [npc2.herHim] into the bodysuit, before buckling [npc2.herHim] up.
